thread.section_title: Royal Magda Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent service, great rooms, great location!
thread.title_full: Excellent service, great rooms, great location! - Review of Royal Magda Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nikhil V
title: Excellent service, great rooms, great location!
text: The hotel is a 1 minute walk away from the Arc de Triomphe, and around 2 minutes walk to Champs Elysses. Location was fantastic! Staff at the hotel for extremely helpful and kind. The service was outstanding. One morning, we decided to try the buffet and the food was up to a good standard! The rooms were nice and modern, and in good hygiene. Will definitely be returning.
